node.statement: Establish the Stirling number expansion: By external reference stirling-falling-factorial, k^n = sum_{j=0}^{n} S(n,j) * k^{underline{j}} where k^{underline{j}} is the falling factorial. By external reference falling-factorial-sum, sum_{k>=j} k^{underline{j}}/k! = e. These identities enable rewriting the Dobinski sum in terms of Stirling numbers.
